title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 444.1 - Establishment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 444.1 - Establishment

State Regulations

There is hereby established a host family home program
to be approved and supervised by the New York State Office of Children and

Family Services (OCFS). Such program shall be governed by the provisions of
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
444.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 8, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 49, eff. 12/8/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
